description.en: Shunichi Kusafue (belongs to Funabashi Racecourse, Okochi stables. A new jockey who has never ridden a race yet) ● Synopsis / Shunichi, who grew up with horses on a ranch in Hokkaido, is currently in Okochi, Funabashi Racecourse. I was supposed to start my long-awaited life as a professional jockey at the stable. What awaits Shunichi when he visits the Okochi stables with his heart pounding with anticipation that it must be a warm environment where people who love horses gather...! ? (Episode 1) ●Characteristics of this volume/Shunichi Kusafue, a rookie jockey who was instructed to belong to the Funabashi Racecourse and Okochi stables because the racetrack he was supposed to belong to has been abolished. However, Okochi, the trainer, once tried to kick Shunichi out, saying he wouldn't listen to such a story, and managed to get him in on the condition that he would also work as a stable attendant...? The hot-blooded & heartful regional horse racing story drawn by Taichi Manjo begins here! ! ● Other characters / Isamu Okochi (trainer belonging to Funabashi Horse Racing. A small stable with three stables. Very short-tempered), Tomomi Okochi (wife of Okochi trainer who decided Shunichi as his jockey), Takuya Yoshida (Okochi stable stable attendant. Dream is a rock star), Kodue Amano (belongs to Koyama stable. Young talented idol jockey in the third year of his debut. He respects Okochi and cares about Shunichi), Hikaru Kenzaki (Belongs to Koyama stables. Top 3 jockeys in Southern Kanto)
